Reviews.Title: Perfect for Purpose
Reviews.Author: A. Cleveland "Reedy River Art"
Reviews.Content: Gave to my granddaughter as a birthday gift, she loves it. In two days she had racked up 1600 snaps, and a couple dozen videos. The quality of the pictures is amazing. Love it.

Reviews.Title: It's a winner
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: So far this camera has filled all my expectations; its easy to operate; pictures come out great; it lightweight to carry.

Reviews.Title: excellent product .... satisfied customer from Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Gloria Esther Sierra
Reviews.Content: satisfied with the product, I affiliate with movistar Venezuela and raises 3G, recommended, very useful, practical and elegantTotal thanks

Reviews.Title: We Have Two
Reviews.Author: Calla Rific
Reviews.Content: Yep. We love this camera so much that we purchased a second. I'm a pro photographer and this is my mommy camera. The second camera went to my 4 year old for her birthday. Great for nice snap shots. There are plenty functions to learn if you choose to but it also works great in auto.

Reviews.Title: Pink FH6 Panasonic with 5X Zoom
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rich
Reviews.Content: Great compact digital camera for quality photographsand a five times optical zoom.  Very reasonably prices.Can be used completely automatically for rapid shootingand convenience.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Dale C. Williams "DCW"
Reviews.Content: This was for my handicapped daughter.  Most camera have many settings that she somehow gets set when not needed.  This camera setting are in a mode button on the back of the camera that does seem to get reset by my daughter.  It is truely a point and shot camera - just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Good camera ... great lens
Reviews.Author: M  MEGAN SAUNDERS
Reviews.Content: I like the size and versatility of this camera.  The downside is that the quick guide book it came with was in Spanish and Italian.  No English.

Reviews.Title: nice camera, one thing missing
Reviews.Author: gioconda
Reviews.Content: The camera is small, light, and pretty in pink.  There is built-in memory so the card (not included) will be for more capacity.  However, my package did NOT contain the wrist strap that should be included, according to the user guide.  By the way, the written guide is in Spanish or Portuguese. The high school class comes in handy!  The CD has an English option so you can read it on the PC.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful 5x z OIS zoom
2.7" LCD
720p HD Video
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix FH6 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Pink)
